title: Zero Gear
notes: Menu loads up fine (with a short delay) but creating a game or looking for games online results in a crash with a log dump window showing up in the background.

title: Zero Gear
notes: Appears to take a while to start a private server, which actually works. I haven't compared to running in Windows. Trying to start or join an online game freezes it, thereby making it unplayable. The process has to be killed to exit.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: I get to the title screen but that's as far as it goes, pop error report has to be sent and then it stalls..
